attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Communism is a dangerous ideology that is a threat to society, the monarchy and the British form of democratic government. In theory Communism is great, but human greed ensures that Communism will continue to fail. Why should a Doctor be paid the same as a Cleaner?* Surely this ideal; if put into place would create untold turmoil and distress amongst society.

*note these jobs are just a comparison and no offence was intended to either profession.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
